name: Little Lost Girl
description:
Join Lina and her mom on an visit to the annual Asian Indonesian event Pasar Malam somewhere in the Netherlands. While mom queues for tickets,  little Lina decides to go ahead and explore by herself.

A game made for Global Game Jam 2021 with the theme Lost and Found.
Working with bitsy for the first time!

Team:  zoewi & Aud1a
